testcase.name: create by name returns a Logger instance()
create by Class returns a Logger instance()
create by reified type and create by Class produce the same name()
create by reified type returns a Logger instance()
create by name returns Logger with the given name()
create by reified type returns Logger named after the type()
create by Class returns Logger named after the class()
create by name with empty string returns Logger with empty name()
create by Class uses the fully qualified class name()
each call to create returns a distinct Logger instance()
